gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Baltic Sea - Temperature and salinity observation collection V1.1

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString:
Seadatanet temperature and salinity historical data collection, including revised quality flags after quality control.
For data access please register at http://www.marine-id.org
The dataset format is ODV binary collections. You can read, analyse and export from the ODV application provided by Alfred Wegener institute at http://odv.awi.de/

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: Alfred-Wegener-Institute for Polar- and Marine Research
Institute of Meteorology and Water Management National Research Institute, Maritime Branch in Gdynia (IMWM MB)
Institute of Oceanology, Polish Academy of Sciences (IO PAS)
GEOMAR Helmholtz Centre for Ocean Research Kiel
NIOZ Royal Netherlands Institute for Sea Research
Department of Marine Research of the Environmental Protection Agency
Marine Systems Institute at Tallinn University of Technology
Aarhus University, Department of Bioscience, Marine Ecology Roskilde
Odessa Branch of SOI (State Oceanographic Institute)

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: EMODNET chemistry lot aggregated parameter names

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: SeaDataNet Usage Agreement: If you use SeaDataNet data in your publications please include the following in the Acknowledgements: Data were provided through SeaDataNet Pan-European infrastructure for ocean and marine data management (https://www.seadatanet.org)

gmd:otherConstraints.gco:CharacterString: No limitations on public access. For data access please register at http://www.marine-id.org

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: COMMISSION REGULATION (EU) No 1089/2010 of 23 November 2010 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards interoperability of spatial data sets and services

gmd:statement.gco:CharacterString: The data used as input for this product have been extracted from the SeadataNet Download Service: http://www.seadatanet.org/Data-Access/Common-Data-Index-CDI
